Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Ichi ndi chifukwa chakuti Mulungu sasintha madalitso amene amapereka kwa anthu mpaka pamene iwo asintha makhalidwe awo, ndipo ndithudi, Mulungu ndi wakumva ndi wodziwa

Monga anthu a Farawo ndi iwo amene adalipo kale, iwo sadakhulupirire uthenga wa Ambuye wawo kotero Ife tidawaononga chifukwa cha zolakwa zawo ndipo Ife tidamiza anthu a Farawo chifukwa onse adali osalungama
Ndithudi zolengedwa za moyo zimene ndi zoipitsitsa pamaso pa Mulungu ndi anthu osakhulupirira ndipo iwo sadzakhulupirira
Iwo ndiwo amene iwe umapanga nawo mapangano koma iwo amaphwanya mapangano awo nthawi zonse ndipo iwo saopa Mulungu
Ngati iwe uwapambana pomenyana nawo nkhondo, alange kwambiri kuti ukhoza kuthamangitsa iwo amene ali kumbuyo kwawo kuti akhoza kuphunzira
Ngati iwe uopa chinyengo chochokera kwa anthu, nawenso abwezere mwawubwino machitidwe omwewo. Ndithudi Mulungu sakonda anthu aupandu
Ndipo anthu osakhulupirira asaganize kuti akhoza kuthawa chilango. Ndithudi iwo sadzatha kudzipulumutsa

Ndipo akonzekereni iwo mwamphamvu, mmene mungathere, kuopseza adani a Mulungu ndi adani anu ndiponso ena amene inu simuli kuwadziwa koma Mulungu amawadziwa. Ndipo chili chonse chimene mudzaononga mu njira ya Mulungu chidzabwezedwa kwa inu ndipo inu simudzaponderezedwa
Koma ngati iwo afuna kukhazikitsa mtendere, nanunso khazikitsani mtendere ndipo khulupirirani mwa Mulungu. Ndithudi Iye ndi wakumva ndi wodziwa
